casebody.data:
William A. SUTHERLAND and Francis M. Bird, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. NEW YORK & BALTIMORE TRANSPORTATION LINES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 132. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 26, 1942. Clarence Blair Mitchell, of New York City (Choate, Mitchell & Ely and H. Henry Ramm, all of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. George M. Clarke, of New York City (Charles Markell, of Baltimore, Md., of counsel), for appellee.

Before' SWAN, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and FRANK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed on opinion below, 43 F.Supp. 94.
